yourData: Your data will go here once you run uptimerobot.py with an API key in .env, see env.example for example.
venv: You will need to setup a venv to run this, see https://docs.python.org/3/library/venv.html for documentaton.
packages: Use pip install -r requirements.txt to install all requirements (Use venv)
cron: You can setup a CRON to have this script run as often as you would like. See https://help.ubuntu.com/community/CronHowto for documentaton
bugs: If you encounter any bugs or issues, please create an issue at https://github.com/layeredy/uptimematrix-translators/issues
notice: This .json file will be overwritten upon first successfull startup of uptimerobot.py, if you need to see this file again, check the Github repository.
